articles.author: Khanyiso Tshwaku
articles.title: WATCH | Ouch! Anrich Nortje taken out by camera at the MCG
articles.description: Proteas' speedster Anrich Nortje was on the receiving end of a collision when he was hit by the Spidercam on the second day of the second Test against Australia at the Melbourne Cricket Ground on Tuesday.
articles.content: Proteas speedster Anrich Nortje was on the receiving end of an unexpected on-field collision when he was hit by the Spidercam on the second day of the second Test against Australia at the Melbourne C… [+706 chars]

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Dismal Proteas punished as Warner retires in pain after making 200
articles.description: Opener David Warner battled through searing heat to hit an epic unbeaten 200 in his 100th Test on Tuesday before retiring in pain as Australia consolidated their advantage against South Africa at the Melbourne Cricket Ground.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
